title: Carlos Goes to School
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 40 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L, Fiction Series
description: Carlos Goes to School introduces readers to the print vocabulary for the names of familiar items taken to school. The familiar situation, repeated sentence pattern, and picture-to-text correspondence help early readers make meaningful connections.
meta: backpack, crayons, eraser, pencils, ruler, sweater
Use the reading strategy of connecting life experiences and using prior knowledge to understand text
Rhyme : Listen for words that rhyme
Sound Symbol Relationship : Associate the letter h with the /h/ sound
Proper Nouns : Understand that some words name things
Categorize Words : Categorize words associated with school

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
